channel.title: [FM] Anime FM - Game Thread - Non anime won... yay?
channel.description:
![image|640x496](upload://dAZcFzA3tByihgQDHOEKUyda5kF.jpeg) *It's too logical ~ Geyde* *do it ~Geyde* *Just don't mention my name anywhere ~ Geyde*
**Santa:** Eevee **Santa's little helper:** Marshal, Firekitten
## [color]The well-known stuff:[/color] https://forum.imperium42.com/t/official-forum-mafia-and-forum-of-lies-rules/78926
## [color]Frequently asked questions:[/color] **1. [color=orange] Dear Eevee, I got a problem. I have a friend who would like to join a game and they... the friend I mean, don't know how to do it. Could you help me?[/color]** Worry not a totally-not-also-eevee person who pretends to have a friend! Just write **/join** or make a sacrifice toward dark gods of anime and paste sweet pic of it in this topic!
**2. [color=orange] Dear Eevee, do I need a time travel machine?[/color]** Hah, no, but if you ever build one, send a copy to me anyway. Might be fun. However it's not necessary for this game. Phases will be around 48/24. Around. Oh and also, a minimum of 10 posts per day is required!
**3. [color=orange] Dear Eevee, can I be a nerd?[/color]** Dear Arete, you already are. And it's perfectly fine and allowed, just remember to never throw a game or you will be blacklisted.
**4. [color=orange] Dear Eevee, how should I go about this game?[/color]** Have fun? Be respectful? Do I really need to tell you this?
**5. [color=orange] Dear Eevee, can I be a nerd?[/color]** Arete, stop.
**6. [color=orange] Dear Eevee, do you like canned ham?[/color]** Don't overly spam the thread, this game can get large... sooo... I would rather keep it comfortable for everyone.
**7. [color=orange] Dear Eevee, tell me how I should live?[/color]** Rational nutrition, five meals a day. Smile! Power! Fitness! Sport!
## [color]Mechanics:[/color] It's u-pick. You need to send to hosts names of 3 anime characters when signing up. (In case if they cover up with someone's else choice). We will chose one of them and make role based on it. Easy!
Justified punishment will depend on special rules for given in-game day. Deportation will be assigned and non-exlcusive. In thread hugging sessions might happen depending on special rules for given in-game day and amount of players.
## [color]Players:[/color] <!--td {border: 1px solid #ccc;}br {mso-data-placement:same-cell;}-->
1. Arete - [color=ligblue]Claudia[/color] (Dragon Prince) 11. SamiDerpsALot - [color=red]Doppo Kunikida[/color] (Stray Dogs) 16. Boss110 - [color=red]Sakamoto[/color] (Sakamoro desu ga) 22. Zone_Q - [color=red]Z-one[/color] (Yu-Gi-Oh) 27. clonedcheese - [color=red]Usopp[/color] (One Piece)
## [color]Justifably punished / Deported:[/color] 1. EVO - [color=ligblue]Mitty[/color] (Made in Abyss) - CLEANED 25. TrustworthyLiberal - [color=ligblue]Megumin[/color] (Konosuba) - [color]Town Vigilante[/color] 13. BlueStorm - [color=red]Guido Mista[/color] (JoJo) - [color=red]Mafia strongwiller / ITA shooter[/color] 6. Emilia - [color=ligblue]Sonozaki Shion[/color] (Higurashi) - [color=red]Mafia bus driver[/color] 24. KyoDaz - [color=ligblue]Asuna[/color] (SAO) - [color=red]Mafia 1-shot ransomer / Poison Healer[/color] 9. Mukurolkusaba - [color=ligblue]Peko Pekoyama[/color] (Danganronpa) - Neutral Universal Backup/ [color=red]Mafia White Goo[/color] 17. DryBones - [color=red]Ikaigo[/color] (Hunter x Hunter) - [color=red]Mafia Toxic Goo[/color] 21. Hippolytus - [color=red]Akashi Seijuro[/color] (Kuroko no Basuke) - [color=red]Mafia Goon[/color] 4. Katze - [color=red]Syl[/color][color=ligblue]veon[/color] (Pokemon) - [color]Town Pokemon[/color] 20. Icibalus - [color=red]Shoto Todoroki[/color] (Boku no Hero Academia) - [color=orange]Cosplayer Cult Backup[/color] 7. Squid - [color=red]Todomatsu Matsuno[/color] (Osomatsu-san) - [color=red]Mafia Goon[/color] 12. astand - [color=ligblue]Bernkastel[/color] (Umineko) - [color=red]Mafia Goon[/color] 10. Simon - [color=red]Jake Sully[/color] (Avatar) - [color=red]Mafia Goon[/color] 28. an_gorta_pratai - [color=red]Jotaro Kujo[/color] (JoJo) - [color]Town Protector[/color] 18. ~~Luxy~~ -> Math - [color=red]Kirito[/color] (SAO) - [color=red]Mafia Red Goo[/color] 3. Jgoes - [color=red]Osamu Dazai[/color] (Stray Dogs) - [color=red]Mafia Kind Tracker[/color] 19. ~~Iendun~~ -> Wazza - [color=ligblue]Franziska von Karma[/color] (Ace Attorney) - [color=orange]Cosplayer Cult Leader[/color] 15. Mist1422 - [color=ligblue]Rin[/color] (Shelter)) - [color=red]Mafia Goon[/color] 1. Ami - [color=ligblue]Junko Enoshima[/color] (Danganronpa)) - [color=red]Mafia Chat Cop[/color] 8. DatBird - [color=red]Johnny Joestar[/color] (JoJo)) - [color=red]Mafia Magnet[/color] 5. Sulit - [color=ligblue]Somali[/color] (Somali and the forest spirit) - [color=lightblue]Cosplay cult backup[/color] 14. Italy - [color=red]Akira Kurusu[/color] (Persona 5) - [color=lightblue]Cosplay cult leader[/color] 26. Apprentince - [color=red]Chrollo Lucifer[/color] (Hunter x Hunter) - [color=red]Mafia Brown Goo[/color]
## [color]Backups:[/color] 1. N.1 2. Wazza 3. 4.
.
